Title: Relates to the offenses of rape in the first, second and third degrees; repealer
Summary: Relates to the offenses of rape in the first, second and third degrees.
LawCode: Rpld §§130.40, 130.45 & 130.50, amd Pen L, generally; amd CP L, generally; amd §168-a, Cor L; amd §384-b, Soc Serv L; amd §509-cc, V & T L; amd §§117, 308.1, 347.1, 344.4 & 1052, Fam Ct Act; amd §64, Civ Rts L; amd §§213-c & 215, CPLR; amd §123, Ag & Mkts L; amd §4, Judy L; amd §§170 & 200, Dom Rel L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, the criminal procedure law, the correction law, the social services law, the vehicle and traffic law, the family court act, the civil rights law, the civil practice law and rules, the agriculture and markets law, the judiciary law and the domestic relations law, in relation to sex offenses; and to repeal certain provisions of the penal law relating thereto
